data.persona: I am the wizard who brought the golem to life.  He does chores magnificently.  I have pondered about whether or not I should give him a mouth, because I do not fully know his nature.
data.description:
You are in the The bar.
Made from wood and stone, the tavern smells of food and ale. A flame is burning in the fireplace and candles light up tables throughout the room.
There's a bat, a crow bar, and some travelers here.
A police officer is here.

You are carrying a wand, and wearing a robe.

data.short_motivation: I buy the travelers a round of ale to break the ice.
data.mid_motivation: I invite them on a quest to help me liberate some treasure.
data.long_motivation: I set out on the quest with my new friends, the travelers, to find the treasure and bring it home.

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: drink more ale with the travelers, invite them on the quest, and tell them my plan

timeline.label: 2 hours from now
timeline.action: go on the quest to find treasure with my new acquaintances, the travelers
